text: Milton Gonçalves (; 9 December 1933 – 30 May 2022) was a Brazilian actor, political activist and television director. He was one of the most famous black actors in Brazil. He was known for playing a police chief in Kiss of the Spider Woman. Gonçalves was born in Monte Santo de Minas, Minas Gerais, Brazil. In the 1990s, he ran for Governor of Rio de Janeiro state. Gonçalves died on 30 May 2022 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil from problems caused by a stroke, aged 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Minas Gerais Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian stage actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro Category:Television directors
title: Milton Gonçalves
